title: Correctly manage the memory for iOS, tvOS, watchOS and macOS views
body:
**Description of Change**

Correction of #879. Make sure recreate the memory when the total canvas area changes.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Related to issue #879

**API Changes**

None

**Behavioral Changes**
